name: This never stops to aMAZE me
name_original: This never stops to aMAZE me
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 36 in 72 hours.

Collect all three mystic amulets and take over the world, but don't get lost in the MAZE!

Maze is randomly generated and change over steps.

How many steps it took you to finish?
My personal best is 264 :D
